en-US.summary: A trivia game about South American Capitals featuring Echo Buttons for competitive play.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open south american capitals trivia
Alexa, start south american capitals trivia
Alexa, ask south american capitals trivia to start a new game
en-US.name: Button South American Capitals Trivia
en-US.description: This is a fast-paced, trivia-style game, featuring South American Capitals. Challenge your friends, or play by yourself.
